## contacts.Trust.status property

Trust's status. Standard values are: as Trustee of, as Trustees of, as Co-Trustees of, as an Individual and as Trustee of, as Successor Trustee of.

A custom value can be supplied instead.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
status?: string;
```
